original: 《 餽贈 》少數武將以公義為準則，不輕易接受餽贈而降低忠誠。大部分武將都有欲求：財寶、美色、名聲、地位、美食醇酒、神兵名駒、駐世容顏、詩詞音律、乃至眷屬等；投其所好，能影響其心向逆。
text: "Gifts" A small number of military commanders use justice as the criterion and do not easily accept gifts and reduce loyalty. Most generals have desires:  treasures, beauty, fame, status, food and wine, magic soldiers, appearances, poetry and melody, and even family members, etc.; to do what they like can affect their minds.
